title: Catholic Digest
additional-notes: The first contribution renewal shown here is the earliest specifically mentioning Catholic Digest.  This publication included articles condensed or reprinted from other publications.  We have not checked to see if any of those articles have active renewed copyrights for their original publication.
A 1980 renewal for the 1952 book 'Catholic Digest Reader' may also cover material from 1952 issues that was reprinted in the book.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Joe Kishman for copyright research on this title.
